task.title: Managing System Logs
task.abstract: System Admins can view details of system logs via a table that displays the System Log ID, Registered App, Registered Object, Type, Path, User Type, User Profile, and who created the record. System logs are continuously updated and created in real-time.

step.cmd: Navigate to the System Logs tab in the Spark Framework app.
Click the New button to create a new System Logs record.
step.info: Click Edit to make changes to the data displayed on the System Logs record pages through: View Name, Filter Criteria, Fields to Display, and Visibility.

step.cmd: Enter values for Type, Registered App, Registered Object, Path, Data, and Exception Data. Click Save.
